sentences: Paul Louis Rossi (born 1933 Nantes, Brittany) is a French critic and poet.
In the 1970s he made, with Jacques Roubaud, Lionel Ray, and Pierre Lartigue, exercises on the world Oulipo: The Inimaginaires.
His travel book of St. Ursula was published by Gallimard in 1973.
Philippe Beck, Yves Di Manno, Paul Louis Rossi (2000).
